overview: Albert Lee has over 10 years of experience in design, creative and interactive management. In addition to running Popplet, Albert also works at IDEO in New York. Prior to Popplet, he was Associate Director of Business Development at WPP. Previously, he worked for the design firm 2x4, most recently as the managing director who founded their Beijing office. Early in his career he worked as an architect in the offices of Frank Gehry. He is currently serving on the Board of Directors for AIGA/NY. He holds a BA in Architecture from U.C. Berkeley, a MFA in Design from Yale and a MBA from Columbia Business School.
